text: Brittney Yevette Griner (born October 18, 1990) is an American basketball player. She is 6 ft and 8 inches tall. She was the first NCAA basketball player ever to score 2,000 points and block 500 shots. She came out as lesbian in 2013. She plays for the Phoenix Mercury of the Womenâ€™s National Basketball Association.http://www.huffingtonpost.com/tag/brittney-griner-lesbian She was signed by Nike to model their mens clothes. Griner was born in Houston, Texas. In February 2022, Griner was arrested by Russian officials for carrying vape pens in her luggage. She had been entering Russia to play with the Russian Premier League during the WNBA offseason. On August 4, 2022, Griner was sentenced to nine years in Russian prison.Brittney Griner sentenced to nine years in Russian prison On December 8, 2022, she was released by Russia during a prisoner swap for arms dealer Viktor Bout. ==References== ==Other websites== *WNBA profile Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:African- American basketball players Category:American basketball players Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Lesbians Category:LGBT African- Americans Category:LGBT people from Texas Category:LGBT sportspeople Category:Models from Houston Category:Sportspeople from Houston
title: Brittney Griner
